subject: Snow and Snowstorms
Snowboarding
lead_paragraph: Deep in Alaska, the adventurous snowboarders had to shift their focus from filming to surviving a storm. After 12 days in their tents, they quickly made up for lost time.
snippet: Deep in Alaska, the adventurous snowboarders had to shift their focus from filming to surviving a storm. After 12 days in their tents, they quickly made up for lost time.
